Uses of Class
com.quasar.model.Equation

  • Packages that use Equation 
    Package Description
    com.quasar.util  

    • Uses of Equation in com.quasar.util

      Methods in com.quasar.util that return Equation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Equation MathOperations.getCircumferenceEquation(Coordinates coordinates, double radius)
      From x, y coordinates and the radius, generate the equation of the circumference, and store it in an object.
      Methods in com.quasar.util with parameters of type Equation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Coordinates> MathOperations.getTwoCirclesIntersection(java.util.List<Coordinates> coordinatesList, Equation circleEquationOne, Equation circleEquationTwoNormal)
      Method that calculates the x and y intersection points between two circles, following the following steps: 1.- A sum of equations is made to eliminate the quadratic terms. 2.- Solve for x and obtain a linear equation. 3.- We substitute x in the first equation of the circumference. 4.- The quadratic term and the multiplication of terms are solved 5.- It is simplified to clear and positive and negative. 6.- The coordinates are constructed and added to the intersection list.
